title: PYQT5 LOGIN TEMPLATE
description: A login template for any desktop GUI applications;

title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS BOT
description: Scripts that executes in either QtGUI or terminal/console; A game automation bot that uses primitive I/O functions with PyAutoGUI; Features 20-or-so champions each utilizing their unique skills in clearing jungle camps; Item purchase system implemented with a Tree data structure and DFS algorithm;

title: PATH FINDING VISUALIZER
technologies: A*, Bellman-Ford, BFS, DFS, Dijkstra's, Greedy Best First Search, IDS, UCS
description: A 2D path-finding visualizer implemented in several algorithms (A*, Bellman-Ford, Breadth-First Search, Depth-First Search, Dijkstra's, Greedy Best First Search, Iterative Deepening Search, Uniform Cost Search);

title: SPACE INVADERS
description: Classic arcade game Space Invaders redesigned with airship and weapon selection phase on a survival game mode;

title: GOLD FOR BLOOD [Infinite Side-Scroller Game]
description: An infinite side-scroller game goal of which is to grab as many coins as you can while avoiding traps; Includes menu, credits, how to play, and game windows; Also features parallax scrolling and dynamic trap spawn location;

title: TIC-TAC-TOE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
description: Classic Tic-Tac-Toe game featuring an AI on Minimax algorithm;

title: MEMORY GAME
description: A card-matching memory game implemented in Tkinter GUI;

title: CONNECT FOUR
description: An implementation of classic family game Connect Four;

title: SNAKE
description: An implementation of classic mobile phone game Snake;

title: GLOBAL NEWS SERVICES
description: Scripts that executes in either QtGUI or terminal/console; A game automation bot that uses primitive I/O functions with PyAutoGUI; Features 20-or-so champions each utilizing their unique skills in clearing jungle camps; Item purchase system implemented with a Tree data structure and DFS algorithm;

title: POLYGON MAKER
description: Generates a line of polygons using Turtle library

title: DJANGO E-COMMERCE PROJECT WITH BOOTSTRAP, STATIC FILES, AND PAYPAL PAYMENT
description: An e-commerce implementation with Django (backend) and Bootstrap, Static Files, and Javascript (frontend); Includes two apps (accounts, orders); Class-based views were used on occasion; Default sqlite3 for database engine; Includes Paypal payment integration;

title: DJANGO SOCIAL MEDIA PROJECT WITH BOOTSTRAP
description: A social media implementation with Django (backend) and Bootstrap (frontend); Includes four apps (accounts, user profiles, posts, and chats); Class-based views were utilized on some app views; Signals were also used; Default sqlite3 for database engine; InMemoryChannelLayer backend for channel layer backend; Django environ for sensitive data;

title: DJANGO POLL PROJECT WITH BOOTSTRAP
description: A polling project implementation with Django (backend) and Bootstrap (frontend); Includes three apps (accounts, user profiles, and polls); Class-based views were utilized on some app views; Signals were also used; Default sqlite3 for database engine;

title: DJANGO BLOG PROJECT WITH BOOTSTRAP TEMPLATE
description: A blog implementation with Django (backend) and Bootstrap (frontend); Includes three apps (accounts, posts, and subscriptions); Class-based views were utilized on some app views; Signals were also used;

title: KWIZMO
description: A quiz portal implementation with Django (backend) and Bootstrap (frontend); Includes four apps (accounts, questions, awards, notifications); Class-based views were utilized on some app views; Signals were also used;

title: TRAVEL WEBSITE
description: A website for travel destinations in a particular city in Europe; Coded purely with HTML and CSS only as required;

title: BACTERIA COLONY ANIMATION
description: An animation of bacteria colony chemotaxis behavior in a space provided with nutrients; Bacteria dying and giving birth included;

title: CONSTELLATION MAPPING
description: Script that reads from Yale Bright Star Catalog and maps into SVG using star parameters such as right ascension, declination, and magnitude;

title: PSEUDO YOUTUBE DOWNLOADER
description: A downloader that employs web-crawling activities to download a youtube video;

title: COMPUTER SURVEILLANCE
description: A program that monitors over other devices from screenshots taken at certain time interval;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: ADACOUNTYITGIS
description: An executable program that extracts the precinct numbers given the addresses;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: AHADITH
description: Extracts book content from the website to a formatted text file;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: BOLOGNACHILDRENSBOOKFAIR
description: Extracts publishers, addresses, contacts, and age categories;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: CONTACTCARS
description: Extracts car names, models, and costs;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: DORIDDLES
description: Extracts riddles and answers;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: MERRIAM-WEBSTER
description: Extracts words, parts of speech, and URL;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: SEBI
description: Extracts dates and company names;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: TALABAT
description: An executable program that extracts data into two (2) csv files; First file contains restaurant name, address, food type, and logo; Second file contains the food name, description, category, image, and price;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: TERRASHOP
description: Extracts product numbers and prices;

title: WEB DATA EXTRACTION: YELLOWPAGES
description: Extracts business names, contact details, and address;

title: GEKITAI
description: Implementation of the Japanese Gekitai board game;

title: KILLER SUDOKU SOLVER
description: A program that solves a given Killer Sudoku board using Arc-consistency plus Backtracking Algorithm;

title: WORD SEARCH PUZZLE SOLVER
description: A program that searches for words from a given pool of letters in the form of a text file; This utilizes the use of Trie data structure in storing a given set of valid words;

title: N-Queens Solver
description: A program that solves an N-Queens problem of any given board size; The problem is treated as a Constraint Satisfaction Problem (CSP) and is solved with Z3 Solver;

title: UPWORK COVER LETTER GENERATOR
description: An executable program to generate a cover letter according to user-defined project parameters;

title: TASK TRACKER
description: A program that defines a function returning a pseudo-hyperbolic progress;

title: SUDOKU SOLVER
description: A sudoku solver implemented with constraint propagation and backtracking algorithm;

title: WORDLE SOLVER
description: A Wordle game solver that filters the valid words from 200,000+ English words based on word guesses and evaluation thereof;

title: HANGMAN
description: A classic hangman game with entries of 200,000+ English words and +/- 1000 movie titles;

title: TOWER OF HANOI SOLVER
description: A Tower of Hanoi solver with recursion and iterative solution;

title: PARKING SYSTEM
description: A parking system project for recording entry and exit of vehicles from a parking lot model; Also features exportation and importation of aforementioned records;

title: PDF SCROLLER
description: A program that scrolls a pdf upon 'up' and 'down' voice command;

title: SYSTEM ACCOUNTS MANAGER
description: A program for creating, updating, and deleting user accounts in Windows OS;

title: CUBE GRAIN & CLUSTER
description: A program that lists the cluster-cubes belonging to a certain grain ID; This 3-Dimensional data is stored in a nested list; The cluster search is implemented in a nested loop with a designed mathematical formula;

title: DJANGO STATIC FILES REPLACER
description: A program that generates a revised HTML file by applying the {% static %} format on an HTML template;

title: HTML LIST GENERATOR
description: A program that generates a nested HTML list elements from a given list structure using DFS algorithm;

title: DEVICE CHECKER
description: A program that checks for active HA devices; Also identifies component failures;

title: STORY GENERATOR
description: A program that generates a story from a given template in text file format;

title: THUMBNAIL GENERATOR
description: A program that generates images for youtube thumbnails;

title: CRYPTOCURRENCY WEIGHT BALANCER
description: A program that recursively balances the weights of a set of cryptocurrencies while not exceeding the weight-capping;
